description: The country's severe coronavirus crisis is highlighted by its most famous peak, the Matterhorn.
title: Coronavirus: Mountain light show sends message to Swiss
title_page: Coronavirus: Mountain light show sends message to Swiss - BBC News
maintext: It's three weeks since the elderly were advised to stay at home, and the rest of us to travel as little as possible, two weeks since the schools were closed, 11 days since bars, cafes, restaurants and all non-food shops were shut and everyone who could was told to work from home.
